segment.source: The following checklist is intended to provide a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take to install Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 1.0.
segment.target: The following checklist is intended to provide a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take to install Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 1.0.

segment.source: Ensure your computing environment meets the supported configurations required for installing MED-V 1.0.
segment.target: Ensure your computing environment meets the supported configurations required for installing MED-V 1.0.

segment.source: Plan and design the MED-V server infrastructure.
segment.target: Plan and design the MED-V server infrastructure.

segment.source: Verify the required prerequisites are configured.
segment.target: Verify the required prerequisites are configured.

segment.source: Install and configure the MED-V server.
segment.target: Install and configure the MED-V server.

segment.source: How to Install and Configure the MED-V Server Component
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the MED-V Server Component

segment.source: If using an image repository, configure the image Web distribution server.
segment.target: If using an image repository, configure the image Web distribution server.

segment.source: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server
segment.target: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server

segment.source: Install the MED-V client and management console.
segment.target: Install the MED-V client and management console.

segment.source: How to Install MED-V Client and MED-V Management Console
segment.target: How to Install MED-V Client and MED-V Management Console
